title: Riot Pls: Dev priorities and the League client

replies.body: why is it "Riot Pls" instead of "Rito Pls"
Because their company is called Riot, not Rito. They're not going to cave into your meme because an employee made a spelling error.
**Rito pls** delete this spam

> [{quoted}](name=Examqle,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=U5F5RUkb,comment-id=000100020002,timestamp=2016-06-21T09:43:13.323+0000)
>
> **Rito pls** delete this spam

Done!
Read my other response
its only free because they want to sell your phone number to ad sites so expect sms spam if you sign up

nope. I have used pages like this (and yes I also tried this one) before and I never received any other SMS than verification/unsubscribing. After unsubscribed you receive no more SMS ever. That is in their contract.. this is very easy to use and not much different than any common verification. Please inform yourself before spreading nonsense

finally, a reason for my phone 
*wipes a {{item:3070}}
only user who knows what's up. this is exactly how it is
just what i was thinking

Rito pls. Why isn't it "Rito Pls?!" ?

lel.
Will the champions in the loading screen be animated? Just like the ones in the 'Warriors' film clip?
you smell
sandpit mode? rito plz{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I love how they still refuse to mention replays as if we will someday have no need for them
Will finding a game still change you out of what you were doing and take you to the home screen if someone misses queue or declines?

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update if you look at this you can see "A resource-light, standalone friends list keeps you in the League loop without needing to open the full-size client. Drop a line to friends and see who’s in game all while background patching, browsing the web, or even (gasp!) playing a different game. You’ll even be able to launch straight into a game with a simple click.
this is not what i am talking about just saying but it seems cool.
I'm pretty sure when people say "Riot Pls" that's not what they were talking about.
its most definitely a complaint
{{summoner:4}}
{{champion:115}} {{item:3105}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} {{summoner:30}}

I don't know where to complain about this issue so I'll just complain here. RIOT! I'm so sick of these issues you guys should give me about 40-30 LP Because I've been robbed. Numerous times I've gone into champ select and then randomly a bug effects my fps and my game freezes I can here the music talk to people in chat but I cannot select the champ I want to ban or use, so I get kicked and relieve the timer ban. I've lost well over 30 LP due to this reason and I'm sick of it.
Hear * receive *
Pls bring back doombots
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

why is it only high elo that are getting focused on what about the majority of us that are in low elo
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> [{quoted}](name=DiggiWorme,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=U5F5RUkb,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-06-23T06:48:39.342+0000)
>
> why is it only high elo that are getting focused on what about the majority of us that are in low elo
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

High elo is where the greatest imbalances are, but Riot is working to make Dynamic Queue a more conducive environment for all players.
how long does it take to be accepted for the Alpha Client?
ive been waiting over 2-3 months

> [{quoted}](name=JonSnowDed,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=U5F5RUkb,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-06-22T23:55:32.536+0000)
>
> ive been waiting over 2-3 months

Applications are approved in cycles. The second wave was just approved about 1-2 weeks ago, so just hang tight! More slots will be open in the future.
